items.headline: Standard Chartered is finally slashing its bitcoin price target by half. Here’s why.
items.summary_en: As bitcoin climbed on Tuesday, Standard Chartered said it now expects the crypto to end the year higher at $100,000. However, that marks a sharp revision down from its previous year-end target of $200,000.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: Cracker Barrel backtracked on a remodel and logo change. Did that help the company?
items.summary_en: Cracker Barrel faced a social-media backlash. It now faces “unique and ongoing headwinds” in its business.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: ‘It’s a perilous choice’: I’ve been offered a part-time job. Do I file for Social Security at 67 or 70?
items.summary_en: “My income will be reduced to less than one-fifth of my current annual salary.”

items.headline: The maid of honor approved my bridesmaid dress months ago. Now she says it’s ‘too bright.’ Do I have to buy a new one?
items.summary_en: “Finding a dress that fits me and looks half decent is always a challenge, and I usually end up spending around $200 or more per gown.”

items.headline: Can Adobe’s ‘incredibly frustrating stock’ turn around after earnings? Wall Street is doubtful.
items.summary_en: Adobe’s stock is cheap and the company is better monetizing AI. But analysts think defeating negative investor sentiment could take some time.

items.headline: ‘I love my work’: I’m a 61-year-old Chicago public-school teacher with a $60K annual pension. Is it safe?
items.summary_en: “I am aware that my pension as a Chicago public school teacher is dependent on factors that are very much in flux right now.”

items.headline: ‘Where are we vulnerable?’ My husband and I are in our 50s. Our $450K mortgage is paid off. We have $500K in IRAs.
items.summary_en: “We will not be downsizing our home, but we do have rental income of about $1,500 per month.”

items.headline: ‘I’m desperately trying to do right by everyone’: I’m giving my son $250K and my daughter 50% of a rental we co-own. Is that fair?
items.summary_en: “I am currently saving this money for him.”
